casebody.data:
A. Mark ESPOSITO
v.
TALBERT & BRIGHT, INC. and John T. Talbert, III. No. 154P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2008. J. Heydt Philbeck, Sr., Raleigh, for A. Mark Esposito. F. Darryl Mills, Wilmington, for Talbert & Bright, et al. Prior report: 181 N.CApp. 742 , 641 S.E.2d 695 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 28th day of March 2007 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of March 2008."
